abstract: Mohammadou Idrissou (born 8 March 1980 in Yaoundé) is a Cameroonian football striker who currently plays for German club 1. FC Kaiserslautern.
comment: Mohammadou Idrissou (born 8 March 1980 in Yaoundé) is a Cameroonian football striker who currently plays for German club 1. FC Kaiserslautern.
name: Idrissou, Mohammadou
